name: Para
description: PARA is a community driven token, built on the Ethereum blockchain, that aims to change the crypto space with real world utilities including an NFT Marketplace and a Launchpad that vets new projects to help everyone enter the crypto space safely. At the heart of the Para EcoSystem, a portion of every transaction supports veterans around the world through our partnerships with nonprofit organizations such as Convoy of Hope and Xtreme Couture GI Foundation.
